Detailed Description

Array data selection class.

Assoc. array is assumed.

pf_selectData ( &$  arrData,
$  strColumn,
$  strSeparator = "," 
)

Selects values from one column from an associative array.

Call this to select values of a $strColumn from $arrData which will be concatenated to a string separated by $strSeparator.

Parameters:
array$arrData
string$strColumn
string$strSeparator
Returns:
string
